metadata.name: Payload Decoded and Decrypted via Built-in Utilities
metadata.comment: Detects when a built-in utility is used to decode and decrypt a payload after a macOS disk image (DMG) is executed. Malware authors may attempt to evade detection and trick users into executing malicious code by encoding and encrypting their payload and placing it in a disk image file. This behavior is consistent with adware or malware families such as Bundlore and Shlayer.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/openssl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/volumes/')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enc')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-base64')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d ')))
